magazines.description: A fascinating look into UFO sightings and encounters from the late 1990s. Features in-depth investigations, eyewitness accounts, and analysis of unexplained phenomena.
magazines.customText: This issue includes exclusive interviews with researchers and a special report on the Phoenix Lights incident.
magazines.coverAnalysis: The cover features a dramatic nighttime photograph of alleged UFO lights over a Scottish city. The composition suggests the iconic Phoenix Lights incident, with multiple luminous objects arranged in a distinctive V-formation against the dark sky. The bold typography and fluorescent color scheme were characteristic of 1990s UFO magazine design, meant to catch the eye on newsstand shelves.
magazines.issueContents: This double issue contains the groundbreaking report on the Phoenix Lights mass sighting of March 13, 1997. Features include eyewitness testimonies from over 700 witnesses, analysis of the V-shaped craft's flight path, interviews with military officials, and enhanced photographic evidence. Also includes articles on the Roswell 50th anniversary, Area 51 disclosures, and the Hale-Bopp comet UFO theories.
magazines.youtubeVideoTitle: RETRO UFOs - Digging Into UFO Magazine (1997) ISSUE #36-37
magazines.youtubeVideoDescription: Join me as I crack open a vintage UFO magazine from decades past and explore how people used to think about aliens, flying saucers, and government cover-ups! We’ll read strange stories, wild “eyewitness” accounts, and see how UFO culture has evolved over time.
